trans-unit.source: Defines the Unicode category of a character.
trans-unit.target: 定義字元的 Unicode 分類。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref:System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory> enumeration is returned by the <xref:System.Char.GetUnicodeCategory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref:System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory>列舉型別由<xref:System.Char.GetUnicodeCategory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.CharUnicodeInfo.GetUnicodeCategory%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory> enumeration is also used to support <xref:System.Char> methods, such as <xref:System.Char.IsUpper%28System.Char%29>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.UnicodeCategory>列舉型別也用來支援<xref:System.Char>方法，例如<xref:System.Char.IsUpper%28System.Char%29>。

trans-unit.source: Such methods determine whether a specified character is a member of a particular Unicode general category.
trans-unit.target: 這類方法會判斷指定的字元是否為特定的 Unicode 一般分類的成員。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode general category defines the broad classification of a character, that is, designation as a type of letter, decimal digit, separator, mathematical symbol, punctuation, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 一般分類中定義的字元，也就是指定為字母、 十進位數字、 分隔符號、 數學符號、 標點符號、 等一種廣泛的分類。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is based on The Unicode Standard, version 5.0.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉型別依據 Unicode Standard、 5.0 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "UCD File Format" and "General Category Values" subtopics at the [Unicode Character Database](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57650).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Unicode Character Database](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57650) 中的 "UCD File Format" 和 "General Category Values" 副標題。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode Standard defines the following:
trans-unit.target: Unicode 標準定義下列項目：

trans-unit.source: A surrogate pair is a coded character representation for a single abstract character that consists of a sequence of two code units, where the first unit of the pair is a high surrogate and the second is a low surrogate.
trans-unit.target: Surrogate 字組是順序的包含兩個字碼單位，其中配對的第一個單位為高 surrogate，而第二個是順序的低 surrogate 是順序的單一抽象字元編碼的字元表示。

trans-unit.source: A high surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+D800 through U+DBFF and a low surrogate is a Unicode code point in the range U+DC00 through U+DFFF.
trans-unit.target: 高 surrogate 是 Unicode 字碼指標 U + D800 到 U + DBFF 範圍內，且為低 surrogate Unicode 字碼指標 U + DC00 到 U + DFFF 範圍中。

trans-unit.source: A combining character sequence is a combination of a base character and one or more combining characters.
trans-unit.target: A 結合字元序列是基底字元和一個或多個組合字元的組合。

trans-unit.source: A surrogate pair represents a base character or a combining character.
trans-unit.target: Surrogate 字組代表基底字元或組合字元。

trans-unit.source: A combining character is either spacing or nonspacing.
trans-unit.target: 間距或非間距組合字元。

trans-unit.source: A spacing combining character takes up a spacing position by itself when rendered, while a nonspacing combining character does not.
trans-unit.target: 間距組合字元佔用本身進行轉譯時，而非間距組合字元沒有間距位置。

trans-unit.source: Diacritics are an example of nonspacing combining characters.
trans-unit.target: 變音符號是非間距組合字元的範例。

trans-unit.source: A modifier letter is a free-standing spacing character that, like a combining character, indicates modifications of a preceding letter.
trans-unit.target: 修飾詞字母是表示，組合字元，例如修改前導字母的獨立式間距字元。

trans-unit.source: An enclosing mark is a nonspacing combining character that surrounds all previous characters up to and including a base character.
trans-unit.target: 封入標示為非間距組合字元圍住所有先前字元最多並包括基底的字元。

trans-unit.source: A format character is a character that is not normally rendered but that affects the layout of text or the operation of text processes.
trans-unit.target: 格式字元是的字元，一般不會呈現，但會影響文字版面配置或文字處理的作業。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode Standard defines several variations to some punctuation marks.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 標準定義數個變化某些標點符號。

trans-unit.source: For example, a hyphen can be one of several code values that represent a hyphen, such as U+002D (hyphen-minus) or U+00AD (soft hyphen) or U+2010 (hyphen) or U+2011 (nonbreaking hyphen).
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以是表示連字號，例如 U + 002D （連字號減號） 或 U + 00AD 的幾個程式碼值的其中一個連字號 （選擇性連字號） 或 U + 2010 （連字號） 或 U + 2011 （分行的連字號）。

trans-unit.source: The same is true for dashes, space characters, and quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 上述同樣適用於連字號、 空格字元和引號。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode Standard also assigns codes to representations of decimal digits that are specific to a given script or language, for example, U+0030 (digit zero) and U+0660 (Arabic-Indic digit zero).
trans-unit.target: Unicode 標準也會將指派代碼表示的專屬於指定的指令碼或語言，比方說，是 U + 0030 （數字為零） 的十進位數字和 U + 0660 （阿拉伯數字為零）。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the characters and their corresponding code points for characters in the UppercaseLetter category.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會顯示 UppercaseLetter 類別目錄中的字元和其相對應的字碼指標的字元。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the example to display the letters in any other category by replacing UppercaseLetter with the category of interest to you in the assignment to the `category` variable.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改範例以顯示在任何其他類別的代號中指派給, 您感興趣的類別以取代 UppercaseLetter`category`變數。

trans-unit.source: Note that the output for some categories can be extensive.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，某些分類的輸出可能很長。

trans-unit.source: Closing character of one of the paired punctuation marks, such as parentheses, square brackets, and braces.
trans-unit.target: 一個成對標點符號的開閉字元 (例如括弧、方括弧和大括弧)。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pe" (punctuation, close).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pe" 表示 (標點符號、關閉)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 21.
trans-unit.target: 值為 21。

trans-unit.source: Connector punctuation character that connects two characters.
trans-unit.target: 連接兩個字元的連接線標點符號字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pc" (punctuation, connector).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pc" 表示 (其他、連接線)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 18.
trans-unit.target: 值為 18。

trans-unit.source: Control code character, with a Unicode value of U+007F or in the range U+0000 through U+001F or U+0080 through U+009F.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 值為 U+007F 或者落在 U+0000 到 U+001F 範圍或 U+0080 到 U+009F 範圍內的控制碼字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cc" (other, control).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Cc" 表示 (其他、控制項)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 14.
trans-unit.target: 值為 14。

trans-unit.source: Currency symbol character.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣符號字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Sc" (symbol, currency).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Sc" 表示 (符號、貨幣)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 26.
trans-unit.target: 值為 26。

trans-unit.source: Dash or hyphen character.
trans-unit.target: 破折號或連字號字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pd" (punctuation, dash).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pd" 表示 (標點符號、破折號)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 19.
trans-unit.target: 值為 19。

trans-unit.source: Decimal digit character, that is, a character in the range 0 through 9.
trans-unit.target: 十進位數字字元，即 0 到 9 範圍內的字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Nd" (number, decimal digit).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Nd" 表示 (數字、十進位數字)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 8.
trans-unit.target: 值為 8。

trans-unit.source: Enclosing mark character, which is a nonspacing combining character that surrounds all previous characters up to and including a base character.
trans-unit.target: 封入標記字元，即圍住所有先前字元直到基底字元 (含) 的非間距組合字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Me" (mark, enclosing).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Me" 表示 (記號、封入)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 7.
trans-unit.target: 值為 7。

trans-unit.source: Closing or final quotation mark character.
trans-unit.target: 關閉或最終引號字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pf" (punctuation, final quote).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pf" 表示 (標點符號、最終引號)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 23.
trans-unit.target: 值為 23。

trans-unit.source: Format character that affects the layout of text or the operation of text processes, but is not normally rendered.
trans-unit.target: 影響文字版面配置或文字處理作業但一般不會呈現的格式字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cf" (other, format).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Cf" 表示 (其他、格式)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 15.
trans-unit.target: 值為 15。

trans-unit.source: Opening or initial quotation mark character.
trans-unit.target: 開啟或初始引號字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Pi" (punctuation, initial quote).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Pi" 表示 (標點符號、初始引號)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 22.
trans-unit.target: 值為 22。

trans-unit.source: Number represented by a letter, instead of a decimal digit, for example, the Roman numeral for five, which is "V".
trans-unit.target: 以字母 (非十進位數字) 代表的數字 (例如，羅馬數字 5 就是 "V")。

trans-unit.source: The indicator is signified by the Unicode designation "Nl" (number, letter).
trans-unit.target: 指標是以 Unicode 指定 "Nl" 表示 (數字、字母)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 9.
trans-unit.target: 值為 9。

trans-unit.source: Character that is used to separate lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 用來分隔文字行的字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Zl" (separator, line).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Zl" 表示 (分隔符號、行)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 12.
trans-unit.target: 值為 12。

trans-unit.source: Lowercase letter.
trans-unit.target: 小寫字母。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Ll" (letter, lowercase).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Ll" 表示 (字母、大寫)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 值為 1。

trans-unit.source: Mathematical symbol character, such as "+" or "= ".
trans-unit.target: 數學符號字元 (例如 "+" 或 "= ")。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Sm" (symbol, math).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Sm" 表示 (符號、數學)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 25.
trans-unit.target: 值為 25。

trans-unit.source: Modifier letter character, which is free-standing spacing character that indicates modifications of a preceding letter.
trans-unit.target: 修飾詞字母字元，這是表示修改前導字母的獨立式間距字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Lm" (letter, modifier).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Lm" 表示 (字母、修飾詞)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 3.
trans-unit.target: 值為 3。

trans-unit.source: Modifier symbol character, which indicates modifications of surrounding characters.
trans-unit.target: 表示修改周圍字元的修飾詞符號字元。

trans-unit.source: For example, the fraction slash indicates that the number to the left is the numerator and the number to the right is the denominator.
trans-unit.target: 例如，分數斜線表示左邊數字為分子，右邊數字為分母。

trans-unit.source: The indicator is signified by the Unicode designation "Sk" (symbol, modifier).
trans-unit.target: 指標是以 Unicode 指定 "Sk" 表示 (符號、修飾詞)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 27.
trans-unit.target: 值為 27。

trans-unit.source: Nonspacing character that indicates modifications of a base character.
trans-unit.target: 表示修改基底字元的非間距字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Mn" (mark, nonspacing).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Mn" 表示 (記號、非間距)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 5.
trans-unit.target: 值為 5。

trans-unit.source: Opening character of one of the paired punctuation marks, such as parentheses, square brackets, and braces.
trans-unit.target: 一個成對標點符號的開啟字元 (例如括弧、方括弧和大括弧)。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Ps" (punctuation, open).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Ps" 表示 (標點符號、開啟)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 20.
trans-unit.target: 值為 20。

trans-unit.source: Letter that is not an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a titlecase letter, or a modifier letter.
trans-unit.target: 不是大寫字母、小寫字母、字首大寫字母或修飾詞字母的字母。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Lo" (letter, other).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Lo" 表示 (字母、其他)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 4.
trans-unit.target: 值為 4。

trans-unit.source: Character that is not assigned to any Unicode category.
trans-unit.target: 未指派給任何 Unicode 分類的字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cn" (other, not assigned).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Cn" 表示 (其他、未指派)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 29.
trans-unit.target: 值為 29。

trans-unit.source: Number that is neither a decimal digit nor a letter number, for example, the fraction 1/2.
trans-unit.target: 不是十進位數字也不是字母數字的數字 (例如，分數 1/2)。

trans-unit.source: The indicator is signified by the Unicode designation "No" (number, other).
trans-unit.target: 指標是以 Unicode 指定 "No" 表示 (數字、其他)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 10.
trans-unit.target: 值為 10。

trans-unit.source: Punctuation character that is not a connector, a dash, open punctuation, close punctuation, an initial quote, or a final quote.
trans-unit.target: 不是連接線、破折號、開啟標點符號、關閉標點符號、初始引號或最終引號的標點符號字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Po" (punctuation, other).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Po" 表示 (標點符號、其他)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 24.
trans-unit.target: 值為 24。

trans-unit.source: Symbol character that is not a mathematical symbol, a currency symbol or a modifier symbol.
trans-unit.target: 不是數學符號、貨幣符號或修飾詞符號的符號字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "So" (symbol, other).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "So" 表示 (符號、其他)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 28.
trans-unit.target: 值為 28。

trans-unit.source: Character used to separate paragraphs.
trans-unit.target: 用來分隔段落的字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Zp" (separator, paragraph).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Zp" 表示 (分隔符號、段落)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 13.
trans-unit.target: 值為 13。

trans-unit.source: Private-use character, with a Unicode value in the range U+E000 through U+F8FF.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 值落在 U+E000 到 U+F8FF 範圍內的私用字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Co" (other, private use).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Co" 表示 (其他、私用)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 17.
trans-unit.target: 值為 17。

trans-unit.source: Space character, which has no glyph but is not a control or format character.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字符也不是控制或格式字元的空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Zs" (separator, space).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Zs" 表示 (分隔符號、空格)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 11.
trans-unit.target: 值為 11。

trans-unit.source: Spacing character that indicates modifications of a base character and affects the width of the glyph for that base character.
trans-unit.target: 間距字元，表示修改基底字元並影響該基底字元字符寬度。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Mc" (mark, spacing combining).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Mc" 表示 (記號、間距組合)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 6.
trans-unit.target: 值為 6。

trans-unit.source: High surrogate or a low surrogate character.
trans-unit.target: 高 Surrogate 或低 Surrogate 字元。

trans-unit.source: Surrogate code values are in the range U+D800 through U+DFFF.
trans-unit.target: Surrogate 字碼值落在 U+D800 到 U+DFFF 的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Cs" (other, surrogate).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Cs" 表示 (其他、Surrogate)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 16.
trans-unit.target: 值為 16。

trans-unit.source: Titlecase letter.
trans-unit.target: 字首大寫字母。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Lt" (letter, titlecase).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Lt" 表示 (字母、字首大寫)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 2.
trans-unit.target: 值為 2。

trans-unit.source: Uppercase letter.
trans-unit.target: 大寫字母。

trans-unit.source: Signified by the Unicode designation "Lu" (letter, uppercase).
trans-unit.target: 以 Unicode 指定 "Lu" 表示 (字母、大寫)。

trans-unit.source: The value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 值為 0。
